item.title: Red graffiti on roundabout, 15th September
item.description:
A Red Cross has been graffitied on the white mini roundabout on Green Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing not working, 15th September
item.description:
I have pressed the button for the pedestrian crossing on college road next to Sandford Park and although the wait lights up, it turns off again. The traffic lights remain green. I tried a number of times and waiting 10 minutes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 15th September
item.description:
customer has expressed concerns of new mini roundabout where drivers are indicating to access garage (esso garage) and confusing roundabout/junction users which may cause collision. driver was indicating on the roundabout but entering the garage and signaling caused confusion with other drivers
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between 26 and 25 cutsdean close, 15th September
item.description:
I hope you're doing well. We recently cut some dead branches, and I would really appreciate your help in finding a way to dispose of them properly. If possible, it would be great to arrange for a truck to pick them up and take them to a specific location. I'm not quite sure if we can just bag them up and leave them for garbage collection, so any guidance you could provide would be really helpful. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cutsdean Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
